title: Set up time period during which WP is allowed to check emails
body:
Hi,
Please add the From To options right after "Download new email" under each email account to specify when the phone is allowed to check emails.
Due to some spam emails the phone alerts me about new emails in the middle of the night. It's extremely annoying. Even my old phone Nokia E71 running on Symbian had an opportunity to specify the time period during which new emails will be checked.
